primary_changes: Enhanced prompt complexity and detail for region color identification
Added more explicit instructions for color distinction
Introduced visual examples and step-by-step guidance

patterns_discovered: Detailed, structured prompting improves AI model performance
Color identification requires nuanced, multi-dimensional instructions
Breaking complex tasks into systematic steps enhances accuracy
gotchas_discovered: AI models can struggle distinguishing similar colors (pink vs coral, teal vs cyan)
Region boundaries are not always straightforward or rectangular
Consistent color labeling is crucial for accurate mapping
recommendations: Use highly structured, visually rich prompts for complex visual tasks
Include multiple comparison techniques (saturation, hue, brightness)
Provide concrete examples demonstrating correct vs incorrect approaches
Add confidence scoring to help models self-assess their accuracy
